title: AI Agent for Customer Support Automation
description: Looking for developer to build AI agent that handles L1 support tickets...
proposal_draft: I specialize in building autonomous AI agents using OpenClaw and Claude. I can create a system that reads tickets, drafts responses, and escalates complex issues. Recent project: Built similar agent handling 200+ tickets/day with 87% resolution rate.

title: Automate My Business Workflows with AI
description: Need help setting up AI automation for email processing, calendar management, and daily reporting...
proposal_draft: I build custom AI business agents that run 24/7. My OpenClaw-based systems handle email triage, calendar optimization, and proactive opportunity scanning. I can have your core workflows automated within 48 hours.
